readme:
# Boreal Dark syntax Theme

![schermata 2018-12-08 alle 21 08 18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40722053/49690263-2bff0200-fb2e-11e8-9a06-228e7019e819.png)

The Boreal Dark syntax theme is the dark, relaxing, but still cool version of the original boreal theme for the Atom editor. Late night coding session? Tired of black and colorless themes? 
This one is for you!
# Install
Install the Boreal Dark syntax theme via Atom by going to Preferences/Settings > Install and search for boreal-dark-syntax (search under 'Themes'), or run in your terminal window:
`apm install boreal-dark-syntax`

# Feedbacks/Help
If you liked/used this theme please make sure to leave a comment/suggestion to help me improve and update it even more!

If you'd like to collaborate with me, please send an e-mail to nori.filippo@gmail.com. Thank you!
